segments.text: I see the woman in the kitchen, focused intently on drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost amusing how unaware she is of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in that puddle, yet she seems completely disinterested in the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s strange how such a trivial task can consume someone so much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen, though chaotic with water spilling everywhere, feels almost serene compared to what I know is happening with the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re plotting something, I can sense it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a certain thrill in watching them so close to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
